name: Pix-Drum
description:
Are you a fan of musical drums but don't have the money to buy one? Do you like pixel art? Pix-Drum is what you need! -Control your own set of drums and play the style you want, from your computer or your smartphone, with excellent audio quality. -Enjoy different styles of sets and colorful backgrounds. New sets will be in every update. You can suggest yours too. -Try the Pad style, for more comfort on touch devices. -Choose the sound quality from Low or High. Especially for low-end devices that experience sound lag. -Features under development: Customize your own set with different components. Change the sound effects to get your wished style.
Feedback it's important: bugs? fixes about Drums? suggestions? ideas? Leave them in the comments! Do you want to feel the thrill of the beat in your favorite rock/metal songs?  Download Pix-Drum and start playing the drums while you perfect your technique.
